channel.title: Comments on: Don’t Use Our Website

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/04/16/dont-use-our-website/#comment-4029">Paul Reinheimer</a>.
Years ago when I worked for a university that purchased lots of Dells, a purchase always ended up with a call to a sales rep. It was frustrating back then too.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Paul Reinheimer.

Years ago when I worked for a university that purchased lots of Dells, a purchase always ended up with a call to a sales rep. It was frustrating back then too.

item.title: By: Paul Reinheimer
item.dc:creator: Paul Reinheimer
item.description:
So would I :)
I plan on blogging about my problems with Dell's website in particular in the near future.
item.content:encoded:
